title: Internet Download Manager FULL Activation - Only Patch-Crack[unt
description:
This is just the crack and patch, to activate the IDM
If you already have IDM and need only activate this is your solution!
Active until the last version 6.17.build.8
This tested and works 100% guaranteed.
There antivirus that can give early warning of infection, but that's just a "false positive".
Below I leave the indications for the use of the patch and crack and the subsequent activation of the IDM
REMEMBER!!:
To make this procedure disconnects the internet first, turning the Reuter, or temporarily disconnecting the Ethernet cable!

xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

INSTALL NOTES:

Instructions:

USE PATCH:
1. - Install the program, do not start. Close the icon is in the taskbar (next to the Windows clock).
2. - Copy the contents of the folder "Patch" in "C:  Program Files (x86)  Internet Download Manager",
Start the patch "FAXp.exe" (as admin in Vista/7/8) and press "Patch" in the spaces to show you must put your details (Name / Last Name, Nickname, or the data you want).
Close the patch.
3. - Start the program, use.
Ready!!

USE PATCH 2:
RUN this patch AS ADMINISTRATOR if your OS win vista/7
1. Exit IDM (if running)
2. Apply Patch
Ready!!

USE CRACK:
1. - Install the program and leave the installation window open, even not to press the "Finish" button, wait ....
2. - Copy the contents of the folder "Crack" in "C:  Program Files (x86)  Internet Download Manager", replace.
Run the file "register.reg" (is in the folder Crack).
3. - Press the "Finish" button and the program will begin already registered.
Ready!!

PD. The Crack is just the patch applied, without Antivirus alerts;)

xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx


Instrucciones:

USAR PATCH:
1.- Instale el Programa, no lo inicie. Cerrar el icono que esta en la barra de tareas (al lado del reloj de windows).
2.- Copie el contenido de la carpeta "Patch" en "C:Program Files (x86)Internet Download Manager",
Iniciar el patch "FAXp.exe" (como admin en vista/7/8) y presionar "Patch", en los espacios que te muestre debes colocar tus datos (Nombre/Apellido, Nickname, o el dato que quieras).
Cerrar el patch.
3.- Iniciar el programa, usar.
Listo !!!!

USAR PATCH 2:
*Ejecute este patch COMO ADMINISTRADOR si tu sistema es windows vista, 7 u 8.
1. Salir de IDM (si se esta ejecutando)
2. Aplica el Patch.
Listo!!

Para activar versiones Portables:

Instrucciones (Portable):
1.- Ejecutar "register.reg", para registrar el portable (hacerlo solo si eres admin).
2.- Ir a la carpeta "Internet Download Manager" ejecutar "IDMan.exe" para iniciar el portable.

PD. El archivo de registro "remove-register;;quitar-registro.reg", lo ejecutas cuando quieras eliminar el portable o cambiar de ubicaciÃƒÂ³n.

To activate Portable versions:

Instructions (Portable):
1. - Run "register.reg" to register the portable (it only if you are admin).
2. - Go to the folder "Internet Download Manager" run "IDMan.exe" to start the portable.

PD. The registry file "remove-register;; remove-registro.reg", just run it when you want to remove or relocate portable.
Ready!!
